page.title: 07BRAESIDE BAR NEAR COOKSTOWN
page.content: BRAESIDE BAR HAS 1 LARGE LOUNGE,1 SMALLER LOUNGE,A T.V. ROOM,1 SMALL BAR AND A PUBLIC BAR.THERE WOULD BE{30 _ {40 PATRANS ON AN AVERAGE NIGHT}AND 200 AT A WEEKEND .THEY SERVE ALCOHOL AND BAR SNACKS.OPENING HOURS ARE FROM {1.00 p.m. to 12.00 p.m.}.THE BAR ATTENDER AGREES THAT PUBS SHOULD{NOT BE{OPEN ON SUNDAY}.THE CUSTOMERS ARE USUALLY LOCAL.THE HOUSE ABOVE THE BAR IS UNOCCUPIED.ALTOGETHER THERE ARE 8 PEOPLE WORKING IN BRAESIDE;7 OF THESE ARE PART TIME.THE OWNER OF THE BAR HAS A CONCRETE BUSINESS AND A FARMING BUSINESS.{ENTERTAINMENT}IS USUALLY COUNTRY AND WESTERN GROUPS.{UNDERAGE {DRINKING}CAN OCCUR AS IT IS DIFFICULT TO JUDGE YOUNG GIRLS WEARING MAKE_UP etc..YOUNG CHILDREN MUST GO TO THE T.V. ROOM.{
